The most frequent situation you can face with is looking for a candidate on existing project  It can be \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Creating+a+Position\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"new position\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or replacement. This process usually starts with finding Candidate inside EPAM by \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Creating+a+PRR\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"creation of a Project Resource Request (PRR)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". As soon as PRR is submitted, it is automatically assigned to a particular person or group of persons- \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/EPAM+Centralized+Staffing\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Committee's\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or Bench manager of corresponding discipline, which helps in finding a candidate for a project, PRR Performer' being responsible for staffing of the positions defined in PRR either offers appropriate resource from his/her own Resource pool or communicates possible candidates with their RMs and finally offers required resource to the position.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to check  available resources on bench, please, contact Bench manager of corresponding discipline. For detailed instructions, please, follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Utilizing+employees+on+bench\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Utilizing employees on bench.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Together with that, you can use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFT Bench Managers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of your country.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a trainee or a student (lab) at EPAM is accepted for a vacancy/position, a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMADPT/Transformation+request\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Transformation Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" should be created.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If there is nobody appropriate available, we move to the looking for Candidate from the Market by creation of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMADPT/Working+with+Vacancy+Request\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacancy Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". To start hiring, an approval from the head of an Organizational Unit should be received. There is an established process of new employee hiring in EPAM. In case you would like to participate and get more, please follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMUHF/Unified+Hiring+Framework\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As soon as an appropriate person is found and job offer is accepted, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/UPSA/NER%3A+Workflow+by+NER+submitting+for+namesakes-newcomers+and+re-hired+employees+should+be+improved\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Employee Reques\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/workload/html/help/WebHelp_long/Recruiting_new_people/Creating_a_new_employee_request.htm\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"t\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – to be submitted. This request supposes accounts creation for all internal systems, working place arrangement, pass key creation and etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Applicant can be proposed on the project before he starts working as company employee.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee from your pool could be booked by PM, but you should check if booking is still valid. Booking is valid during 2 weeks only. After that time Project Manager should assign offered resource to the specific project position or release the candidate back to the pool.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When preliminary negotiations are completed and candidate suits the position, you should \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Proposing+Candidates\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"propose\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" him in UPSA. At the same time, make sure that employee profile in UPSA is up to date and ready to be exported for Customer \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"provision\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Please, work with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=258377741\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CV & Interview Support Service\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You also take part in preparation\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"passing interview with Customer (provide information about possible questions, suggest training to attend).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only after Accepting the Candidate on the Position by PM/AM, the process is completed. Together with that, Candidate can be rejected in case candidate didn't meet expectations/canceled if position is closed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
